creator: TypeSETit
trademark: Lovers Quarrel is a trademark of Robert E. Leuschke.
license_desciption: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL.
description: Lovers Quarrel is an ornate calligraphic script. It has beautifully embellished uppercase characters and clean, legible lowercase forms. Lovers Quarrel is a Unicode typeface that supports languages that use the Latin script and its variants, and could be expanded to support other scripts. To contribute to the project contact Rob Leuschke.
